SEARCH
Package io.clonecloudstore.common.standard.system

Class SysErrLogger

java.lang.Object
io.clonecloudstore.common.standard.system.SysErrLogger
public final class SysErrLogger extends Object
Utility class to be used only in classes where standard Logger is not allowed
